details.description: I worked as an integration intern for ii in the summer of 2025, I was able to assist in q-sys plugin development and the opening of a new ride at Hersheypark.
I have worked in both Bandit's touring prep shop, and their integration division.  I have gained valuebale experience on how to prep, tour, and integrate state of the art lighting equipment
I worked as the GrandMA3 programmer for my team's Photona piece.  I was able to leverage palletization and recipes to quickly try out different ideas.
I worked as an assistant on Fairview at UNCSA in fall of 2024.  I was able to gain skills in Lightwright 6, and Vectorworks Spotlight.
